tool_description: Generates visual entity-relationship diagrams from validated schema definitions with customizable layout and styling options.

schema_name.description: Name of the schema to generate diagram for

diagram_format.description: Output format: SVG, PNG, PDF, or PlantUML

layout_style.description: Diagram layout: hierarchical, circular, or force_directed

include_attributes.description: Whether to show attributes in the diagram

error_messages: Schema not found: The specified schema_name does not exist.
Invalid diagram format: Format must be one of [SVG, PNG, PDF, PlantUML].
Invalid layout style: Style must be one of [hierarchical, circular, force_directed].
Empty schema: Schema must contain entities for diagram generation.
Diagram generation failed: Unable to generate diagram due to schema complexity or formatting issues.
usage: Provide schema_name to generate ER diagram. Configure diagram_format, layout_style, and visibility options for attributes, cardinalities, and constraints.

schema_name.description: Name of the schema used for diagram generation

diagram_url.description: URL or path to the generated diagram file

entity_count.description: Number of entities included in the diagram

relationship_count.description: Number of relationships shown in the diagram
